author: Jasmine Aviles
review: The apartments are decent, yet there was constant mold buildup in the bathroom of the apartment I lived in. Parking sucks. Too many neighbors were loud and would take neighbors spots, one of the leasing managers had way more parking than

author: Dawn Potvin
review: Lived here about a year now and I cannot say anything but good things.  There was a management change but it was a very smooth transition. The new maintenance team is great and I have wonderful neighbors

author: C S
review: I love living here! I moved from TX to here and everyone in the office was so helpful and nice. This is my first apartment ever. It is actually my first time ever renting anywhere! Maintenance was prompt and so friendly (even though I

author: Elizabeth Caughey
review: Great apartment at an affordable price!  I moved in a few months ago and my move in was easy and enjoyable.  The office staff was friendly and the location is great.  I had a small maintenance issue and maintenance fixed it quickly without

author: Philip Caughey
review: Just moved in and the staff made it a simple process.  I like that we can rent washers and dryers as well for only $40 a month.  I love that it doesn't have carpet either.  You can tell the maintenance staff has good attention to detail.

author: Elena Reese
review: One star because it's better than being homeless. They have serious black mold issues, ceilings are falling in in spots. They prop it up with moo handles. Maintenance men are rude and disrespectful. Drug dealers in multiple units and hit and runs are far to common. You can do better!

author: Crystal Garcia
review: Management here is great they are very helpful and so nice. Ive lived here for almost a year and i have not had a problem with this apartment complex. I highly recommend living here.

author: Lauren Stovall
review:
By far the worst place weve lived at.
The only reason I wouldnt give 1 star is that the office people are nice.
No parking, extremely nosey neighbors, no privacy, A LOT of sketchiness, trash everywhere, came home to swat team blocking the entrance one time should I go on?

author: Jamie Johnson
review: Management is great and always super helpful. My apartment is very nice inside and I havent had a single issue since I moved in. I would highly recommend renting here.

author: David Kornfield
review: I really enjoyed renting an apartment here.  The management has always been pleasant and quick to respond to maintenance requests.
